org.jgrapes.webconlet.markdowndisplay
A web console component for displaying markdown text in a web console.
org.jgrapes.webconlet.messagebox
 
org.jgrapes.webconlet.oidclogin
This package provides an OIDC login conlet (with fallback to password login).
org.jgrapes.webconlet.sysinfo
A web console component for displaying system information in a web console.
org.jgrapes.webconsole.base
Provides the components for building web consoles based on the core, io and http packages.
org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events
The events used by the web console related components.
org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker
Classes for implementing a freemarker based web console component.

    Class
    Description
    AbstractConlet
    Provides a base class for implementing web console components.
    Conlet.RenderMode
    The render modes.
    ConletComponentFactory
    A factory interface for web console components.
    ConsoleConnection
    The server side representation of a window in the browser that displays a console page (a console connection).

  • Classes in org.jgrapes.webconsole.base used by org.jgrapes.webconsole.base
    Class
    Description
    AbstractConlet
    Provides a base class for implementing web console components.
    AbstractConlet.ConletTrackingInfo
    The information tracked about web console components that are used by the console.
    Conlet.RenderMode
    The render modes.
    ConsoleConnection
    The server side representation of a window in the browser that displays a console page (a console connection).
    ConsoleRole
    A Principal representing a role used by web console components.
    ConsoleUser
    A Principal representing an identity used by web console components.
    ConsoleWeblet
    The server side base class for the web console single page application (SPA).
    ConsoleWeblet.ConsoleResourceChannel
    The channel used to send PageResourceRequests and ConletResourceRequests to the web console components (via the console).
    JsonRpc
    A class that serializes/deserializes as a JSON RPC.
    RenderSupport
    Provides support for creating URIs in the web console scope that are forwarded to components listening on the web console channel.
    ResourceByGenerator.Generator
    The interface that must be implemented by the content provider.
    ResourceByProducer
    Returns a Runnable that writes to an OutputStream as result.
    ResourceByProducer.ContentProducer
    Must be implemented by a content producer.
    ResourceResult
    The base class for all results from processing a resource request.
    WebConsole
    Provides the web console component related part of the console.
    WebConsole.ConsoleMXBean
    The MBeans view of a console.
    WebConsole.ConsoleMXBean.ConsoleConnectionInfo
